name: Major Bailey #1

recipeInstructions.text: Lightly MUDDLE (only to bruise) mint with gin in base of shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into glass half filled with crushed ice
CHURN (stir) drink with ice using a barspoon
Top the glass to the brim with more crushed ice and churn again
